org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.binding.api

接口 WriteTransaction

  • 所有超级接口:
    AsyncTransaction<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>, AsyncWriteTransaction<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>, org.opendaylight.yangtools.concepts.Identifiable<Object>
    所有已知子接口:
    ReadWriteTransaction
    所有已知实现类:
    ForwardingReadWriteTransaction, ForwardingWriteTransaction
    已过时。 
    Use WriteTransaction instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface WriteTransaction
extends AsyncWriteTransaction<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>
    A transaction that provides mutation capabilities on a data tree.

    For more information on usage and examples, please see the documentation in AsyncWriteTransaction.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static boolean CREATE_MISSING_PARENTS
      已过时。 
      Flag value indicating that missing parents should be created.
      static boolean FAIL_ON_MISSING_PARENTS
      已过时。 
      Flag value indicating that missing parents should cause an error.

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.common.api.data.AsyncWriteTransaction

        SUBMIT_EXCEPTION_MAPPER

    • 方法详细资料

      • put

        <T extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject> void put(LogicalDatastoreType store,
                                                                        org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<T> path,
                                                                        T data)
        已过时。 
        Stores a piece of data at the specified path. This acts as an add / replace operation, which is to say that whole subtree will be replaced by the specified data. *

        This method does not automatically create missing parent nodes. It is equivalent to invoking put(LogicalDatastoreType, InstanceIdentifier, DataObject, boolean) with createMissingParents set to false.

        For more information on usage and examples, please see the documentation in AsyncWriteTransaction.

        If you need to make sure that a parent object exists but you do not want modify its pre-existing state by using put, consider using merge(org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.common.api.data.LogicalDatastoreType, org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<T>, T) instead.

        参数:
        store - the logical data store which should be modified
        path - the data object path
        data - the data object to be written to the specified path
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the transaction has already been submitted

      • put

        <T extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject> void put(LogicalDatastoreType store,
                                                                        org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<T> path,
                                                                        T data,
                                                                        boolean createMissingParents)
        已过时。 
        Stores a piece of data at the specified path. This acts as an add / replace operation, which is to say that whole subtree will be replaced by the specified data.

        For more information on usage and examples, please see the documentation in AsyncWriteTransaction.

        If you need to make sure that a parent object exists but you do not want modify its pre-existing state by using put, consider using merge(org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.common.api.data.LogicalDatastoreType, org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<T>, T) instead. Note: Using createMissingParents with value true, may introduce garbage in data store, or recreate nodes, which were deleted by previous transaction.

        参数:
        store - the logical data store which should be modified
        path - the data object path
        data - the data object to be written to the specified path
        createMissingParents - if CREATE_MISSING_PARENTS (true), any missing parent nodes will be automatically created using a merge operation.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the transaction has already been submitted

      • merge

        <T extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject> void merge(LogicalDatastoreType store,
                                                                          org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<T> path,
                                                                          T data)
        已过时。 
        Merges a piece of data with the existing data at a specified path. Any pre-existing data which is not explicitly overwritten will be preserved. This means that if you store a container, its child lists will be merged.

        This method does not automatically create missing parent nodes. It is equivalent to invoking merge(LogicalDatastoreType, InstanceIdentifier, DataObject, boolean) with createMissingParents set to false.

        For more information on usage and examples, please see the documentation in AsyncWriteTransaction.

        If you require an explicit replace operation, use put(org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.common.api.data.LogicalDatastoreType, org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<T>, T) instead.

        参数:
        store - the logical data store which should be modified
        path - the data object path
        data - the data object to be merged to the specified path
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the transaction has already been submitted

      • merge

        <T extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject> void merge(LogicalDatastoreType store,
                                                                          org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<T> path,
                                                                          T data,
                                                                          boolean createMissingParents)
        已过时。 
        Merges a piece of data with the existing data at a specified path. Any pre-existing data which is not explicitly overwritten will be preserved. This means that if you store a container, its child lists will be merged.

        For more information on usage and examples, please see the documentation in AsyncWriteTransaction.

        If you require an explicit replace operation, use put(org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.common.api.data.LogicalDatastoreType, org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<T>, T) instead.

        参数:
        store - the logical data store which should be modified
        path - the data object path
        data - the data object to be merged to the specified path
        createMissingParents - if CREATE_MISSING_PARENTS (true), any missing parent nodes will be automatically created using a merge operation.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the transaction has already been submitted

      • delete

        void delete(LogicalDatastoreType store,
            org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?> path)
        已过时。 
        从接口复制的说明: AsyncWriteTransaction
        Removes a piece of data from specified path. This operation does not fail if the specified path does not exist.
        指定者:
        delete 在接口中 AsyncWriteTransaction<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>
        参数:
        store - Logical data store which should be modified
        path - Data object path
